ingredients.ingredient: 1 (16 ounce) package frozen French-cut green beans

cookingTips: Toast the almonds lightly in a dry pan before adding beans for enhanced flavor
Keep the heat moderate to prevent the tamari from burning
Add almonds near the end of cooking to maintain their crunch
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How would you adjust the saltiness if you used regular soy sauce instead of tamari?
